long_description:
An intelligent Mastra-powered code assistant that provides comprehensive code analysis, debugging help, and optimization suggestions. 

**Key Features:**
• **Multi-Language Support**: JavaScript, Python, Java, HTML, CSS, and more
• **Smart Code Analysis**: Automatic language detection without requiring code blocks
• **Debugging Assistance**: Identifies bugs, errors, and potential issues
• **Optimization Suggestions**: Best practices and performance improvements
• **Educational Examples**: Step-by-step explanations with code samples

**How to Use:**
Simply mention @code_helper_agent followed by your code or question. No special formatting required!

**Examples:**
• "@code_helper_agent Explain this function: function add(a,b) { return a + b; }"
• "@code_helper_agent Debug this Python: def calculate(x): return x * 2"
• "@code_helper_agent Why is this Java code not working? public class Test { ... }"

Built with Mastra framework and Gemini AI for professional-grade code analysis.
name: code_helper_agent
short_description: AI assistant for code analysis, debugging, and optimization
